title: Diamond Prices
description: Dataset is based on a case study called "Sarah Gets a Diamond". This case was presented in the first year decision analysis course at Darden School of Business (University of Virginia). The task is to predict the price of a diamond given attributes such as carat weight, cut, color, clarity, polish, symmetry and report (grading agency which reported the qualities of the diamond).

features.name: Cut
features.description: Cut of diamond - one of [Signature-Ideal, Ideal, Very Good, Good, Fair]

features.name: Color
features.description: Color of diamond - one of [D, E, F, G, H, I]

features.name: Clarity
features.description: Clarity of diamond - one of [SI1, VS1, VS2, VVS2, VVS1, IF, FL]

features.name: Polish
features.description: Polish of diamond - one of [VG, ID, EX, G]

features.name: Symmetry
features.description: Symmetry of diamond - one of [EX, ID, VG, G]
